## YubikeyBackend class

YubiKey backend via `ykman` CLI.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class YubikeyBackend implements SecretBackend 
```
**Implements:** [SecretBackend](./vaultkeeper.secretbackend.md)

## Remarks

Requires ykman to be installed and a YubiKey to be connected. Secrets are stored in files encrypted using the YubiKey's challenge-response capability (HMAC-SHA1) via slot 2.
